channel.title: TheHGTech - Cybersecurity & Threat Intelligence
channel.description: Expert cybersecurity guides, threat intelligence, CVE tracking, and security news. Free resources for security professionals.

item.title: Notepad++ Hijacked: APT31 Deploys Chrysalis Backdoor via 6-Month Supply Chain Attack
item.description: Chinese state-sponsored hackers APT31 compromised Notepad++'s WinGUp update mechanism for 6 months, deploying the previously undocumented 'Chrysalis' backdoor to telecom and financial targets in East Asia.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: PureRAT: Vietnamese Threat Actor Deploys AI-Generated Malware in Phishing Campaign
item.description: Vietnamese hackers leverage AI to develop malware components in ongoing PureRAT campaign. First documented case showing clear AI-generation markers including emojis and numbered steps in attack scripts.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: GlassWorm Returns: Open VSX Extensions Compromised in Second Wave Supply Chain Attack
item.description: Self-propagating GlassWorm malware strikes again, compromising 4 established Open VSX extensions via credential theft. New variant targets macOS developers, uses Solana blockchain for C2.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: Ivanti EPMM Zero-Days CVE-2026-1281: Critical RCE Exploited in Wild
item.description: Active exploitation of two new Ivanti EPMM zero-days (CVE-2026-1281 & 1340) allows authentication bypass and RCE. CISA mandates federal patching by Feb 1.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: Nike Data Breach: 1.4TB of Internal Designs & Employee Data Stolen
item.description: Hackers claim theft of 1.4TB from Nike's internal network, including futuristic product designs and employee PII, via third-party vendor compromise.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: Malicious VS Code Extensions Steal Source Code: 'MaliciousCorgi' Campaign
item.description: Thousands of developers compromised by fake AI coding extensions in VS Code Marketplace. 'MaliciousCorgi' campaign steals source code and AWS keys.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: Microsoft Teams Phishing: Hackers Exploit Guest Feature for Credential Theft
item.description: Sophisticated phishing campaign abuses Microsoft Teams' 'Invite a Guest' feature to bypass email security and steal enterprise credentials.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: Microsoft Office Zero-Day CVE-2026-21509 Actively Exploited - Emergency Patch Released
item.description: Microsoft releases emergency out-of-band patch for CVE-2026-21509, an actively exploited OLE security bypass affecting all Office versions. CISA mandates patch by Feb 16.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech Security Team

item.title: Infostealer Malware: Why Your MFA Is Already Compromised
item.description: Infostealers don't steal your credentialsâ€”they steal your authenticated session. Analysis of why Lumma, RedLine, and Vidar render MFA completely useless.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: OAuth Worms: The Silent SaaS-to-SaaS Attack Vector Nobody's Watching
item.description: OAuth worms spread across M365, Google Workspace, Slack, and Salesforce using consent-based propagation. The 2026 threat nobody's prepared for.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: Prompt Injection Goes Physical: Hacking Self-Driving Cars and Drones with Text
item.description: UC Santa Cruz reveals CHAI attacks: text placed in the physical environment can hijack autonomous vehicles and drones. Environmental indirect prompt injection explained.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: ShinyHunters Voice Phishing: How Hackers Are Bypassing MFA in Real-Time
item.description: ShinyHunters' vishing campaign targeting 100+ enterprises with real-time MFA bypass. Technical analysis of how they hijack Okta, Microsoft, and Google SSO sessions.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: Luxshare Ransomware Attack: Apple Vision Pro CAD Designs and Secret Product Data Stolen
item.description: RansomHub claims breach of Apple supplier Luxshare. Over 1TB of confidential data stolen including 3D CAD designs for Vision Pro, iPhone, AirPods, and unreleased products.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: DragonForce: The New Ransomware Cartel Built on LockBit and Conti DNA
item.description: From hacktivists to criminal cartel. DragonForce combines LockBit 3.0 and Conti code into a powerful RaaS platform targeting UK retailers and global supply chains.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: AI Agents Will Be the Primary Attack Vector in 2026: A Deep Security Analysis
item.description: With 91,000+ attack sessions targeting AI infrastructure in just three months, AI agents are becoming the primary attack vector. Technical analysis of threats, real incidents, and defense strategies.
item.dc:creator: Harish G

item.title: VS Code Supply Chain Hardening Guide 2026
item.description: Protect your development environment from VS Code extension supply chain attacks. Learn to verify publishers, restrict permissions, and detect malicious extensions.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech

item.title: Unicode-Based LLM Attacks: Defense and Detection Guide
item.description: Comprehensive guide to understanding and defending against Unicode smuggling and homoglyph attacks targeting LLMs. Covers detection strategies and mitigation techniques.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech

item.title: LLM Jailbreaking Defense: Beginner to Intermediate Guide
item.description: Learn to defend your LLM applications against jailbreak attacks. Covers prompt injection, system prompt extraction, and guardrail bypass techniques.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech

item.title: DORA Compliance Guide - Digital Operational Resilience Act
item.description: Comprehensive guide to the Digital Operational Resilience Act (DORA) for financial services. Covers the 5 pillars, incident reporting requirements, resilience testing, and third-party risk management.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech

item.title: NIST CSF 2.0 Implementation Guide
item.description: Complete implementation guide for NIST Cybersecurity Framework 2.0. Covers the new GOVERN function, all 6 core functions, framework structure, and step-by-step implementation roadmap.
item.dc:creator: TheHGTech
